section.title: Watch a Folder for Incoming Reports
section.para:
DocumentBurster
can poll a configurable folder and automatically pick for processing all the reports which are dropped to this folder.

This functionality is useful when integrating with an external legacy system which can be configured to generate the reports to the polled folder, thus obtaining an automated system to generate, burst and distribute the reports.

In
DocumentBurster
main window select Actions , Merge, Burst and Trace... , Poll Folder -> Burst

listitem.para:
Start Polling - Start watching the selected folder for incoming reports. Once the polling is started,
DocumentBurster
will automatically process all the reports which are dropped to this folder.
End Polling - Stop watching/polling the folder for incoming reports.
View Generated Reports - Browse the generated reports.

note.title: Note
note.para:
The polling GUI presented in this chapter is not available in
DocumentBurster Server.
DocumentBurster Server
will automatically start to check (poll) the server/poll folder once it is started.
